applicant_types: UK registered charities; official charitable organisations (UK)
beneficiary_focus: projects that improve quality of life; environmental projects; individuals (via charities)
restrictions: No unsolicited applications accepted (invitation only); No funding for individuals directly; No political activities; No commercial ventures or publications; No purchase of vehicles including mini-buses; No overseas travel, holidays or expeditions
notes: ellenor Hospice would only be eligible if specifically invited to apply. The Trust mainly supports UK registered charities and has funded a range of grant sizes. Applications are not accepted unless invited.
evidence: While ellenor Hospice is a UK registered charity and fits the general applicant type and geographic scope, The Underwood Trust is 'closed to unsolicited applications' and only accepts applications by invitation. The guidelines state: 'Please only make an application if you have been invited to do so.' There is no indication that ellenor Hospice has an existing relationship or invitation. Therefore, under current circumstances, ellenor Hospice is not eligible to apply.
